sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"jquery-cheat-sheet"}}>{`jQuery Cheat Sheet`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-1-core"}}>{`JQ-1: Core`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-javascript"}}>{`//jQuery function

\$.jQuery( selector [, context] | element | elementArray | jQueryObject ), .jQuery( )
\$.jQuery( html [, owner]  | html, props )
\$.jQuery( fn )
def.when(deferreds)
fnjQuery.sub( )
\$.holdReady( hold )

// jQuery Object Accessors

\$.each( fn(index, element) )
num.size( ), .length
str.selector
el.context
\$.eq( index )
jQuery.error( str )
[el],el.get( [index] )
num.index( ), .index( selector | element )
\$jQuery.pushStack( elements, [name, args] )
arr.toArray( )

//Interoperability

\$jQuery.noConflict( [extreme] )
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-2-jquery-attributes"}}>{`JQ-2: jQuery Attributes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-javascript"}}>{`// Attributes

str.attr( name | name , value )
\$.attr( name, val | map | name, fn(index, attr) )
\$.removeAttr( name )
\$.prop( name )
\$.removeProp( name )

// Class
\$.addClass( class | fn(index, class) )
bool.hasClass( class )
\$.removeClass( [class] | fn(index, class) )
\$.toggleClass( class [, switch] | fn(index, class) [, switch] )

// HTML, text
str.html( )
\$.html( val | fn(index, html) )
str.text( )
\$.text( val | fn(index, html) )

// Value
str,arr.val( )
\$.val( val | fn() )
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="hr" components={components}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-3-jquery-selectors"}}>{`JQ-3: jQuery Selectors`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-4-basics"}}>{`JQ-4: Basics`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`#`}{`id
element
.class, .class.class`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`selector1, selector2
Hierarchy
ancestor descendant
parent > child
prev + next
prev ~ siblings`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-5-basic-filters"}}>{`JQ-5: Basic Filters`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`:first
:last
:not(selector)
:even
:odd
:eq(index)
:gt(index)
:lt(index)
:header
:animated
:focus`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-6-content-filters"}}>{`JQ-6: Content Filters`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`:contains(text)
:empty
:has(selector)
:parent`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-7-visibility-filters"}}>{`JQ-7: Visibility Filters`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`:hidden
:visible`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-8-child-filters"}}>{`JQ-8: Child Filters`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`:nth-child(expr)
:first-child
:last-child
:only-child`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-9-attribute-filters"}}>{`JQ-9: Attribute Filters`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`[attribute][attribute=value]`}
{`[attribute!=value][attribute^=value]`}
{`[attribute\$=value][attribute*=value]`}
{`[attribute|=value][attribute~=value]`}
{`[attribute][attribute2]`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-10-forms"}}>{`JQ-10: Forms`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`:input
:text
:password
:radio
:checkbox
:submit
:image
:reset
:button
:file`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-11-form-filters"}}>{`JQ-11: Form Filters`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`:enabled
:disabled
:checked

<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-40-jquery-faq"}}>{`JQ-40: jQuery FAQ`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-41-example---how-to-target-something-within-an-anchor-tag"}}>{`JQ-41: Example - How to target something within an anchor tag`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`In the bottom example from NPWS YAC, we are targeting a div within an anchor tag that will allow us to open a map. That being said, we do not want the anchor tag to activate in this example, so we use the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`e.target`}</MDXTag>{` capability to find whether or not we are targeting what we want, and if not - we ensure the href doesn't activate.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-javascript"}}>{`\$('.hero .toggle').on('click', function (e) {
            if (\$(e.target).hasClass('geolocation')) {
                console.log('here');
                map.\$elem.toggleClass('-active').one('transitionend webkitTransitionEnd oTransitionEnd MSTransitionEnd', function () {
                    if (!map.map) {
                        map.initMap();
                    }
                });

                if (\$('html').hasClass('ie9') || \$('html').hasClass('lt-ie9')) {
                    if (!map.map) {
                        map.initMap();
                    }
                }

                if (map.\$elem.hasClass('-active')) {
                    map.\$toggle.text('Close the map');
                } else {
                    map.\$toggle.text('View the ' + map.title + ' map');
                }

                return false;
            } else {
                e.preventDefault();
                \$(this).parent().toggleClass('-active');
            }
        });
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"jq-42-wait-for-a-transition-to-finish"}}>{`JQ-42: Wait for a transition to finish`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-javascript"}}>{`/* =================================
  Load JavaScript after Transition
==================================== */

map.\$elem.toggleClass('-active').one("transitionend webkitTransitionEnd oTransitionEnd MSTransitionEnd", function () {
    if (!map.map) {
        map.initMap();
    }
});
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
